original_title: Sri Lanka sells Rs45bn in bonds
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka sold 45 billion rupees in 2027 and 2028 bonds with all offered volumes sold, data from the state debt office showed.
22.5 billion rupees of 15 January 2027 bonds were sold at a weighted average yield of 14.48 percent after offering the same volume.
22.5 billion rupees of 01 September 2028 bonds were sold at 14.52 percent, after offering the same volume.
The 2027 bond is offered after auction at the average rate. (Colombo/Nov28/2023)
